content: k14 front k13 left sleeve turn row 1 ws p1 k1 across continue to work on 12 left sleeve sts as follows row 2 knit row 15 p13 turn row 3 purl row 16 decrease k2tog k9 k2tog turn 11 left sleeve sts row 17 p11 turn sleeves set-up cast off all 11 left sleeve cuff sts row 4 increase k2 right back kfb k1 kfb k1 right sleeve kfb k1 kfb k2 front kfb k1 kfb k1 left sleeve kfb k1 kfb k2 left back - 28sts rs facing rejoin yarn to 10 sts on lh needle continue as follows row 5 purl row 14 k10 left back row 6 increase k3 right back kfb k1 kfb k3 right sleeve kfb k1 kfb k4 you ll now work to join left back front right back as follows front kfb k1 kfb k3 left sleeve kfb k1 kfb k3 left back - 36sts row 7 purl row 15 p10 left back p14 front p10 right back - 34sts row 8 increase k4 right back kfb k1 kfb k5 right sleeve kfb k1 kfb k6 row 16-17 beginning with a knit row work two row stocking stitch front kfb k1 kfb k5 left sleeve kfb k1 kfb k4 left back - 44sts cast off all 34 waist sts row 9 purl join sleeves and back seam row 10 increase k5 right back kfb k1 kfb k7 right sleeve kfb k1 kfb k8 weave in all the loose ends front kfb k1 kfb k7 left sleeve kfb k1 kfb k5 left back - 52sts ws together match the row ends that run from the neck cast-on edge to the row 11 purl waist cast-off edge and mattress stitch the seam from neck edge to waist edge row 12 increase k6 right back kfb k1 kfb k9 right sleeve kfb k1 kfb k10 working on one sleeve at a time match the row ends that run from the sleeve cuff front kfb k1 kfb k9 left sleeve kfb k1 kfb k6 left back - 60sts to where you divide for the sleeve the underarm split and mattress stitch the seam row 13 purl from cuff edge to underarm split right sleeve row 14 k10 right back k13 right sleeve turn flip work over so that purl- side faces continue to work on 12 right sleeve sts as follows row 15 p13 turn flip work over so that knit-side faces row 16 decrease k2tog k9 k2tog turn 11 right sleeve sts row 17 p11 turn cast off all 11 right sleeve cuff sts remember to get in touch if you need a little extra advice and of course there is more much more to learn create and be inspired by here @dotpebbles_knits please also remember that this pattern like all of my patterns is copyrighted this prohibits copying or reproducing any of its writing content for your own profit however if you want to sell what you ve made from any of my patterns
